name: Chicken's Egg Hunt
description:
It's Easter time so grab your basket and catch some eggs! 

Chicken's Egg Hunt is a small game where you need to catch as many eggs as you can before the time runs out. You start with 10 seconds and get additional 2 seconds for every egg that you catch.

Controls:
- Desktop - A/D keys for left/right movement
- Mobile - on-screen left/right arrow buttons

It's a little side project from our game in development that you can see here:
https://twitter.com/loonyware

Music:
SNAPPY by Jason Shaw (https://freemusicarchive.org/)
